Mercy Ntia-Obong (by onye amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke anọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1997) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme egwuregwu. O sonyere na asọmpi 4 × 100 mita nke ụmụ nwanyị na  Asọmpi egwuregwu ụwa nke emere na 2019.
N'afọ 2019, o ritere ihe nrite ọla edo na 4 × 100 mita nke ụmụ nwanyị na Egwuregwu ndị Africa nke emere na Rabat, Morocco n'afo 2019. O mekwara asọmpi na mita 200 nke ụmụ nwanyị.
